value.original: Setup of projects and project reporting

row.value: 项目与项目报表的设置

value.original: Projects allow to monitor the status and progress of sales opportunities, service projects and investment projects. A Project is a process that is undertaken which can involve multiple steps or phases and require resources from more than one area.

row.value: 项目是一个涉及多个步骤或阶段，需要多方面资源的过程。你可以用来监控和处理销售机会、服务项目或者投资项目

value.original: Setup a new Language of the system and translate elements

row.value: 设置系统的新语言并翻译元素

value.original: Define a new language as a system language.

row.value: 在系统语言中定义新的语言

value.original: Review of system level setup of a new Client

row.value: 检查新实体的系统级设置

value.original: This workflow reviews the system setup of a new client as performed by the automatic Initial Client Setup. You may want to check also the following Workflows: - Accounting Setup - Business Partner Setup - Product Setup - Price list Setup - Warehouse Setup - Tax Setup

row.value:
检查新实体初始化后的基础设置。除此之外，还可以通过如下工作流检查：
- 设置_会计
- 设置_业务伙伴
- 设置_产品
- 设置_价格表
- 设置_仓库
- 设置_税

value.original: This workflow allows you to review and change your Accounting Rules.

row.value: 检查或者更改财务的会计规则

value.original: This workflow defines the Business Partners and the supporting rules.

row.value: 定义业务伙伴以及相关规则

value.original: Define your products manually. You should verify the settings especially if you import your products.

row.value: 可以手动输入产品，或者检查产品导入的结果

value.original: Define your Price Lists and Discounts

row.value: 设置价格表与折扣模式

value.original: You define your price lists after entering or importing your products. In addition to price lists, you can define discounts for business partners. Assign specific Price Lists and Discounst to Business Partners.

row.value: 定义价格表和折扣模式。对于采购/销售业务，需要定义价格表模式和价格表版本，另外销售业务还可以定义折扣模式，以区分不同的产品或者客户价格

value.original: Setup the tax calculation for products, services and charges

row.value: 为产品、服务或者杂费设置计税相关信息

value.original: Setting up Sales Representatives, Commissions as well as Marketing Channels and Campaigns.

row.value: 设置销售代表、佣金以及营销渠道和营销活动

value.original:
This workflow guides you through setting up your performance measurement based on Key Performance Indicators, Balanced Scorecard, etc.
Most important: Do your analysis first! - What are your goals and how do you measure it?
When you are setting up the system, you do it in reverse: First you define how you measure it and last you define the goals for the measurements. You have three ways measuring performance: - via quantifiable measures (e.g. sales of $3 million in Q1) - via manual measures - via achievements (tasks)
The system converts the measures into percentages (based on the target and achieved measure - or number of total and reached achievements)

row.value:
设置基于“关键绩效指标”或者“平衡计分卡”的绩效信息
绩效规则：你的目标是什么，你如何评估？
设置顺序：先定义评估，最后定义目标
系统提供三种绩效评估方式：量化评估、主观评估，完成状态
系统会将评估以百分比形式表示，基于达到值对比目标值，或者基于已完成数量对比总数量

value.original: When a new Business Partner is created, it is forwarded for review and credit check.

row.value: When a new Business Partner is created, it is forwarded for review and credit check

value.original:
Data Replication allows you to synchronize data of remote instances with a central office. All actions are initialized from the central office.

Central System:
- setup system with all organizations, roles, etc.
- run the migration to make sure that it is up-to-date
- export the central system

Remote System: - install the exact version as Central System
- import data from Central System in the remote locations

Central System: - Replication Strategy
- Define Export Format
- Config Export Processor
- Start JMS Server

** Enter Transactions **

Remote System:
- Config Import Processor

row.value:
数据复制功能会将远程数据库实例同步到中心系统。所有操作的初始化都是从中心系统发出的

Central System:
- setup system with all organizations, roles, etc.
- run the migration to make sure that it is up-to-date
- export the central system

Remote System: - install the exact version as Central System
- import data from Central System in the remote locations

Central System: - Replication Strategy
- Define Export Format
- Config Export Processor
- Start JMS Server

** Enter Transactions **

Remote System:
- Config Import Processor
